titleStmt.title: Description of Christmas at the Duval County Prison Farm
titleStmt.author: Eartha M. M. White, presumably

publicationStmt.p: This document forms part of the project "Editing the Earth M.M. White Collection" at the University of North Florida.

msIdentifier.repository: University of North Florida, Thomas G. Carpenter Library Special Collections and Archives

msContents.summary: Author gives an account of the Christmas events at the Duval County Prison Farm.

objectDesc.p: A single page handwritten account, written on White's stationery.

editorialDecl.p: This file was transcribed and encoded according to the editorial criteria of the project "Editing the Eartha M.M. White Collection." Using the various options encoded within <choice> elements, this file enables the viewing of a diplomatic transcription and a regularized reading text.

body.p:
Miss Ida May Birmingham
and the members of the
Junior League choir of
St. Paul A.M.E. church
Renderedrendered a wonderful
programeprogram inside of the
cold weather early Christmas
morning at the Duval County
Prison Farm. Miss Eartha
M.M. White and also the a
number of the prisoners
Thankedthanked the friends in
behalf of the prisoners for
their kindness also the
officials and County
Commissioners and SuptSuperintendent
J.A. Melson for the Splendidsplendid
Turkeyturkey Dinnerdinner and other
gifts. Every body was made
happy in the afternoon
A vaudevilevaudeville Showshow was given
by the prisoners which
furnished fun for all.
